home.selfIntroduction:
Hey! This is Hongzhi Li, or you can call me Mike. I'm currently a computer science student at USC. This website is my technical homepage. Hope you can know more about me from here! In the Summer of 2012 I got my B.S at Xidian University in China. My major there is Software Engineering. Then I worked for Huawei Technologies in headquarter for 6 months as software engineer. In 2013 Summer I was admitted to USC Viterbi School of Engineering and began my master program here.
I have plenty of experience in building software and website. And I also dabble in some more advanced technologies such as Cloud Computing. To sharpen my algorithm skills, I tackle a couple of problems on LeetCode every day. Generally I prefer coding in C/C++. But I also build Mobile Apps in Java. For WEB front-end language, I found JQuery is really amazing. In case of back-end, I enjoy using PHP. I will graduate at Dec. 2014 and I hope I can get a satisfactory job by then:)

resume.professionalInfo: I worked as both front-end and back-end web developer in a startup company Oskoui+Oskoui, Inc. this Summer 2014. I devoted most of my time there in the development of a subscription-based personalized content platform OwnZones.com. For project OwnZones, I developed the login, sign up, history tracking, publishers, about and bundles modules for UX3 version and took charge of a lot of hotfixes. Also, I participated in the devlopment of some modules of upcoming film websites. Before Oskoui, I worked in Huawei Technologies for half a year. I was a software developer there and developed the plugin packages for signaling processing system(R7).I started the weekly ‘Seek After Knowledge’ seminar for my colleagues to share what they were engaging in. Besides, I also organized the ‘Code Coverage’ project which increased the code coverage of our department from 28% to 60%.

job.description: Took charge of the development of mulitple modules of subscription-based personalized content platform OwnZones.(both front-end and back-end) Developed responsive websites with social media API integration to promote upcoming films.
